scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin artist-spotlight.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/artist-spotlight.html && usemin lifestyle.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/lifestyle.html && usemin music-reviews.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/music-reviews.html && usemin as-denzel-curry.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/as-denzel-curry.html && usemin as-flatbush-zombies.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/as-flatbush-zombies.html && usemin l-lil-tracy.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/l-lil-tracy.html && usemin l-xavier-wulf.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/l-xavier-wulf.html && usemin mr-castles-blp-kosher.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/mr-castles-blp-kosher.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
